Body:
Description: Hello Team,

We are currently exploring ways to achieve the following in Netwrix Endpoint Protector:

Brave Browser Application Blocking – We would like to understand if and how we can block the Brave browser on endpoints using Netwrix Endpoint Protector.

Email Alert for Unauthorized Data Transfers – Is it possible to configure an alert if data is being sent outside of authorized domains? If so, could you please provide guidance on setting this up? user is using Gmail and we have enabled Webmail Protection.
What We've Learned Updated: Client wishes to block the Brave application and also to set up mail CAP policy alerts.
Next Steps Updated: Sent note with instructions for the Brave app but I need to take a look more for the alerts.

What We've Learned Updated: Gave the client detailed responses for both Brave and Email alerts.
Agreed to close the case.
